page.title: 14Riding-A Leisure Activity.
page.content: In this area{horse riding is a popular {hobby}though{it needs quite a lot of {money.}Most people have lessons at one of the two{local stables}but a few may be lucky enough to have a pony of their own. You have to wear special clothes for riding;{jodhpurs; trousers {with padded knee parts, boots with no {grips on the soles but with a little {heel and, most important of all, a {hard hat. Part of the jobs is helping to look after horses.{Mucking out the stable {can be a very messy job but you}get used to the smell after a while. The people who work at the stables have to groom the horses, wash them,{sweep the {yard and give the ponies and horses {food, hay and straw.}We think that anyone who takes up horse riding will enjoy it very much.
